New Records: Fernando Tatis Jr. is one home run shy of the NLDS record for most home runs in a series (3)
Key Match Events: Fernando Tatis Jr. hit a two-run home run in the second inning, Teoscar Hern√°ndez hit a grand slam in the third inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mookie Betts thought he had hit a home run in the first inning but it was caught by Jurickson Profar, who trolled the fans by staring at them and bouncing up and down several times before throwing the ball to the infield
Others: The Padres moved within one victory of eliminating the Dodgers in the NLDS for the second time in three seasons, the game was played at Petco Park which was packed with a rally towel-waving record crowd of 47,744
